EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform 2018 Registration & Call For Proposals Now Open
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-registration-cfp-q118]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
After an unbelievable show in San Francisco, we’re getting ready to do it all again! Join us September 24–27, 2018 in Washington, D.C., for SpringOne Platform 2018 <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-registration-cfp-q118]]>, the premier conference for people who build, deploy, and run cloud-native software.
This unique four-day event brings together leading software companies, enterprises, and cloud experts to collaborate, share knowledge, and create transformational software. I’m also pleased to announce three of the keynotes that we’ve lined up for the show:
- Juergen Hoeller. The Spring Framework project lead will be back again to share all the exciting updates to the Spring family of projects. - Kelsey Hightower. One of Google’s developer advocates, Kelsey is an insightful speaker on topics of system design, ops, Kubernetes, serverless computing, and more. - Neha Narkhede. Neha is the co-founder of Confluent and one of the initial authors of Apache Kafka. She’s an expert on modern, stream-based data processing.
Save $400 off a standard conference pass Get in while the getting is good: Early Bird registration and discounted training prices end on May 1, 2018 at 11:59 PM (Pacific Standard Time). Register now <[[https://springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-registration-cfp-q118]]> and save $400 before it’s too late!
Call for proposals is now open We want to hear from you: If you have a software story to share with the world, we would love to have you propose a session. Join speakers from the world’s leading companies by submitting a talk <[[https://springoneplatform.io/cfp?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-registration-cfp-q118]]> to SpringOne Platform.
Stay connected Join the conversation on Twitter #SpringOne <[[https://twitter.com/hashtag/springone]]>, and follow @S1P <[[https://twitter.com/s1p]]> for news and updates.
I hope to see you there, Richard
